languages.text: {n}Эфир заполняет вкрадчивый, почти шепчущий голос.{/n} "А, вот и сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} Вольный Торговец собственной персоной. Дай угадаю, мне сейчас великодушно предложат сдаться?"
{n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эфир заполняет вкрадчивый, почти шепчущий голос.{/n} "А, вот и сиятельн{mf|ый|ая} Вольный Торговец собственной персоной. Дай угадаю, мне сейчас великодушно предложат сдаться?"

{n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

languages.text: {n}Una voz sedosa y casi susurrante llena el aire.{/n} «Ah, al fin llega {mf|el|la} ilustre Comerciante Independiente. Deja que adivine: ¿vas a hacer alarde de misericordia dándome la oportunidad de rendirme?».
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una voz sedosa y casi susurrante llena el aire.{/n} «Ah, al fin llega {mf|el|la} ilustre Comerciante Independiente. Deja que adivine: ¿vas a hacer alarde de misericordia dándome la oportunidad de rendirme?».

languages.text: {n}音阵装置中传来了轻柔的声音，近乎耳语。{/n}“啊，赫赫有名的行商浪人终于来了。让我猜猜，莫非你打算慷慨地赐予我投降的机会吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置中传来了轻柔的声音，近乎耳语。{/n}“啊，赫赫有名的行商浪人终于来了。让我猜猜，莫非你打算慷慨地赐予我投降的机会吗？”

languages.text: {n}Une voix suave, pareille à un murmure, emplit la pièce.{/n} « Ah, l'illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} daigne enfin nous honorer de sa présence. Laissez-moi deviner : vous allez jouer les grands seigneurs et m'offrir une dernière chance de me rendre ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une voix suave, pareille à un murmure, emplit la pièce.{/n} « Ah, l'illustre {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} daigne enfin nous honorer de sa présence. Laissez-moi deviner : vous allez jouer les grands seigneurs et m'offrir une dernière chance de me rendre ? »

languages.text: {n}柔らかな、ほとんどささやくような声が空気を満たす。{/n}「あぁ、輝かしいローグトレーダーがついに到着した。さて、どうしようか。今、私に降伏するチャンスを恩着せがましく与えるつもりなんだろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

traits.locale_text: {n}柔らかな、ほとんどささやくような声が空気を満たす。{/n}「あぁ、輝かしいローグトレーダーがついに到着した。さて、どうしようか。今、私に降伏するチャンスを恩着せがましく与えるつもりなんだろ？」

languages.text: {n}İpeksi, fısıltıya yakın bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Vay, meşhur Hür Tacir sonunda gelebilmiş. Dur tahmin edeyim... Merhamet edip teslim olmam için bir şans mı vereceksin?"
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İpeksi, fısıltıya yakın bir ses duyuluyor.{/n} "Vay, meşhur Hür Tacir sonunda gelebilmiş. Dur tahmin edeyim... Merhamet edip teslim olmam için bir şans mı vereceksin?"

languages.text: {n}Eine sanfte, beinahe flüsternde Stimme erfüllt die Luft.{/n} "Ah, da ist {mf|er|sie} ja endlich, {mf|der illustre Freihändler|die illustre Freihändlerin}. Lasst mich raten: Gewährt Ihr mir nun die großzügige Chance, mich zu ergeben?"
languages.original_text: {n}A silken, almost whispering voice fills the air.{/n} "Ah, the illustrious Rogue Trader has arrived at last. Let me guess: you will now graciously offer me one chance to surrender?"
